description:
Replacement rotors, compatible with Deore, or SLX disc brakes with Centre Lock. The 2-piece rotor uses an aluminum spider to keep the weight down. A stainless steel braking surface increases pad life, aids clearing and cooling.

  • Precision cut stainless steel surface sheds mud and grime and aids cooling under high load
  • Alloy spider supports rotor surface, increasing rigidity and reducing weight
  • Includes steel lockring
name: Shimano Deore SM-RT64 Center Lock Disc Brake Rotor
